Message: Hi, I’m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
It looks like you're referencing an ad ID. Could you please provide more details or let me know what specific issue or question you have regarding this ad ID? I'm here to help!

If your ad was rejected, you should receive an email with the subject line ‘Urgent: Ad Rejected - Action Required.’ This email will contain the specific reject reason. Please review the bolded reject reason carefully and focus on addressing that specific issue. If you need further assistance, feel free to reach out to adsupport@newsbreak.com.
